SELECT T.*, U.USER_ID FROM tbl_review T inner join tbl_user U on U.USER_NUM = T.USER_NUM WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = #{sellProductNum} and REVIEW_TITLE!='' ORDER BY REVIEW_NUM desc limit #{criteriaProduct.limit},6
SELECT COUNT(SELL_PRODUCT_NUM) FROM tbl_review WHERE SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = ${sellProductNum}
